answers.answer: Hi,It is difficult to give an opinion without knowing your complete medical history and clinical exam.It is important to rule out other causes of pain and numbness in the foot like neuropathies due to diabetes and B12 deficiency.You can try taking B12 supplements and see if they help with your numbness and pain. In the meantime schedule an appointment with your neurologist and get his opinion on this.Thanks

question: I've had three operations on my left foot. It's been 8 years since the last operation.  The doctor was able to release entrapped nerves and my condition improved but the pain and numbness have returned. Is this unusual? Does this mean I'll need to have another operation?
title: Pinched Nerve in Foot
